H0.text: John Hannah and Ken Stott have both appeared in the role of which fictional detective. Inspector Morse

H1.text: John Hannah and Ken Stott have both appeared in the role of which fictional detective. Sherlock Holmes

H2.text: John Hannah and Ken Stott have both appeared in the role of which fictional detective. Hercule Poirot

H3.text: John Hannah and Ken Stott have both appeared in the role of which fictional detective. DI Rebus

A4.text: Rebus was played by John Hannah in the first series.

A5.text: the role was taken over by Ken Stott.
